Younghoon Kim

  • Method Details

    • open

      void open(String metafile, String filepath, int blocksize, int nblocks) throws IOException
      Opening and initializing the directory
      Parameters:
      metafile - A meta-file with configurations for the dictionary (e.g., pagesize)
      filepath - Directory or path for opening the dictionary
      blocksize - Available blocksize in the main memory of the current system for B+ tree
      nblocks - Available block numbers in the main memory of the current system for B+ tree
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception while opening B+ tree

    • search

      int search(int key) throws IOException
      Searching for a key
      Parameters:
      key - The integer key of index term to search
      Returns:
      Status code
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception while accessing B+ tree

    • insert

      void insert(int key, int val) throws IOException
      Inserting a key and the bound value
      Parameters:
      key - Key
      val - Value
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception while accessing B+ tree

    • close

      void close() throws IOException
      Closing the dictionary
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception while closing B+ tree
